round_best: Develop a hybrid neural model that integrates neural radiance fields with differential geometric tools to enhance geometry reconstruction. This model would utilize curvature-based loss functions derived from differential geometry to guide the training of neural radiance fields, focusing specifically on achieving high geometric fidelity at complex surfaces and edges. Simultaneously, the model would leverage multi-view consistency checks to refine the synthesizing process of novel views, ensuring both photorealistic texture rendering and accurate geometry.
